Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject inputMessage = context.Data.ToJObject(); var ESBMessage = inputMessage.ToObject <dynamic> (); var emailList = context.Properties["EmailAddressString"].ToString(); context.Instance.TraceInformation (emailList); var emailSender = context.EnvironmentVariables["SmtpSendAddress"]; var transactionID = ESBMessage.TransactionID; var origin = ESBMessage.ESBTopic; var successMessage = ESBMessage.SuccessMessage; var body = new System.Text.StringBuilder(); var emailSubject = ""; if( origin == "Production Version Approval Send -MessageArrival"){ body.AppendLine("Event ID: 2000. Production Version Approval Acknowledgement has been successfully sent to AMPS."); emailSubject = string.Format("Production Version Approval Acknowledgement sent successfully."); } else if( origin == "Production Version Approval Request -MessageArrival" ){ body.AppendLine("Event ID: 2001. Production Version Approval Request process has been successfully executed."); emailSubject = string.Format("Production Version Approval Request process completed."); } else if( origin == "Order Step Completion Send -MessageArrival" ){ body.AppendLine("Event ID: 2003. Order Step Completion Acknowledgement has been successfully sent to SAP."); emailSubject = string.Format("Order Step Completion Acknowledgement sent successfully.."); } else{ body.AppendFormat("{0}", successMessage); // body.AppendLine("Event ID: 2002. A new message (attached) has arrived on the Neo PLM Integration Endpoint: " + origin + ". Please log into the Neo PLM Client application and address this using the Incoming Materials Editor, at your earliest convenience."); emailSubject = string.Format("A new message has arrived on the Neo PLM Integration Endpoint: {0} Transaction ID is {1}", origin, transactionID); } context.Instance.TraceInformation(string.Format("Sending email '{2}' from {0} to {1}",emailSender,emailList,emailSubject)); var emailTemplate = context.Configuration.TextDocs["SuccessReportTemplate"].Text; emailTemplate = emailTemplate.Replace("${SuccessMessageDetails}", body.ToString()); emailTemplate = emailTemplate.Replace("${OriginalMessage}", System.Net.WebUtility.HtmlEncode ( ESBMessage.OriginalMessage.ToString() )); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "To", emailList); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "From", emailSender); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "Subject", emailSubject); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "Body", emailTemplate);
